column4: When I try to play a video, the sound doesnt play at all. Can anyone explain this to me?
When I try to play a video, the sound doesnt play at all. Can anyone explain this to me?
hi
my name is assinine
When I try to play a video, the sound doesnt play at all. Can anyone explain this to me?
does the sound work at all?
no, it works very well on other programs.
then it might be a problem of the media player you are using. which program do you use to play the video?
I don't know which one it is, It's what ever one came with Super-OS for playing flash video.
ok I do not know much about super-OS it might be that the flash plugin uses the wrong sound driver. To change that, try to find the properties option of said player.
how do I find out which flash plugin it is?
I asume you use a browser to open a web page where you want to play a flash video ?
yes
depending on the browser you use there should be an addons option in the top bar
you mean like under tools in FireFx?
It says I have shockwave flash.
you might try reinstalling it - for this you have to remove the plugin
ok, i'll try that right now
what browser do you use?
Firefox. How do you remove a plugin? There is no uninstall option for it in Frefox
hmm ok I do encounter that problem for the first time. never noticed how difficult it can be to get rid of the plugin
how did you get rid of it?
